directions: Combine watermelon, honeydew, cantaloupe, pineapple, and strawberries in a large bowl. Whisk poppy seed dressing and yogurt together in a bowl; drizzle dressing mixture over fruit before serving.
ingredients: 1 honeydew melon - peeled, seeded, and cubed
1 (12 ounce) bottle poppy seed salad dressing
title: Melon Salad
